definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Our products are unique in style and various in color.
sentences.chinese: 公司產品風格獨具，獨樹一幟，花色品種繁多。

sentences.english: Companies large-scale and variety, as many as models complete, low prices.
sentences.chinese: 公司規模宏大，品種之多，型號齊全，價格低廉。

sentences.english: All varieties tested lost yield and value in treatment 5.
sentences.chinese: 處理5所有參試品種的產量和產值均有損失。
歐洲李和杏的雜交品種。

sentences.english: A large yellow- fruited cultivar that originated in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 一個黃色大果型品種，原產於澳大利亞。

sentences.english: Relatively genetic background of barley landraces were complex.
sentences.chinese: 大麥地方品種遺傳背景相對複雜。

sentences.english: The pup looked to be a cross between a Lab and a German shepherd.
sentences.chinese: 看起來是拉布拉多獵犬和德國牧羊犬交配的品種。

sentences.english: Long-haired breeds will benefit from daily attention to keep their coats smooth.
sentences.chinese: 每天注意要讓長毛品種兔子的皮毛滑順，對其有益。

sentences.english: The growth performance of red tilapia cultured in freshwater was superior to other tilapia species.
sentences.chinese: 星洲紅魚在淡水中養殖生長表現優於其他羅非魚品種。

sentences.english: Colour crepe paper is a kind of paper of widely used.
sentences.chinese: 彩色縐紋紙是廣泛應用的一個紙張品種。

sentences.english: The stronger anti-cold ability of 'Lihong' suggested that the cultivation district of this variety could appropriately be expanded to the north.
sentences.chinese: 該品種具有較強的抗寒性，栽培區域可適當北擴。

sentences.english: The results of regional tests for two years and production tests showed that its yield was much higher than that of the CK, Xintian 501.
sentences.chinese: 在兩年的區域試驗和生產試驗中比對照品種增產顯著。

sentences.english: When sugar beet growers switched to the new varieties two years ago, they did not expect legal problems.
sentences.chinese: 兩年前，甜菜農們換用新品種時並沒想到有法律問題。

sentences.english: The node dry weight in large-spike variety Su200l decreased significantly after leaf removal.
sentences.chinese: 剪葉後大穗型品種宿2001莖稈乾重明顯減輕。

sentences.english: Different types of jade differ in color.
sentences.chinese: 玉質的品種繁多，顏色各異。

sentences.english: In recent years, we have produced a number of new varieties, shopping bags and lanterns.
sentences.chinese: 近年，我們又新生產了多個品種，購物袋以及孔明燈。

definition: rare/not familiar (to the speaker)/sth rarely experience/hard to see
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
